keyFacts: The document is a court filing or communication regarding case 19CR490, which is Jeffrey Epstein's criminal case number.
It was sent on July 11, 2019, from an NYSD Chambers email address to a recipient named Ma.
The attachment filename '19CR490_7.11.19_7.43pm.pdf' suggests it is a timely court filing submitted at 7:43 PM on that date.
